title: Player Scams are Evil (Help Riot)
body:
A while back I was playing some league when a "friend" asked for a mystery gift. Seeing as we've gifted eachother before I said yes and gifted him before he blocked me and never gave me my gift back. I dont care too much if nothing happens but his Summoner name was **BeastyKiad**.

-Fancy out

Edit - I didnt read the rules before I posted this. sorry about the naming o.o
